Despite this, you are encouraged to experiment and explore any Class combinations you can think up. Players will be able to reset and change their Class at an NPC that has not yet been revealed. Unlike in DnD where you have to have a certain Ability Score to be able to swap classes, Baldur's Gate 3 does not have any restrictions and you can swap between Classes freely without losing any character levels.
